item.title: Google warns that mass data theft hitting Salesloft AI agent has grown bigger
item.description: Assume all Salesloft credentials are compromised after Workspace breach, Google says.

item.title: Google discovered a new scam—and also fell victim to it
item.description: Disclosure comes two months after Google warned the world of ongoing spree.
